snippet: Technology that allows the sharing of frequencies is getting new backing as smartphones and tablets put greater demand on available bands.
abstract: Technology that allows the sharing of radio frequencies is getting new backing as smartphones and tablets put greater demand on available bands; number of companies are developing technology to use frequencies more efficiently, and a presidential advisory committee is exploring ways in which computerized radio technologies could make better use of spectrum.
lead_paragraph: Technology that allows the sharing of frequencies is getting new backing as smartphones and tablets put greater demand on available bands.

headline.seo: Companies Try to Create Room on Radio Spectrum
headline.main: Companies Try to Create Room on Radio Spectrum
